description_html:
Artline is Bandalux’s most exclusive product, created by industrial designer Joan Gaspar (Barcelona, 1966). This is a roller shade with a decorative built-in valence that gives the shade an additional aesthetic effect.

The decorative front strip of the Artline shade has two sides, enabling the user to choose between an aluminum profile with a relief and a decorative strip with different available designs. Moreover, it comes with a methacrylate plate as an optional cover for the decorative strip, to give it greater depth and shine.

The Artline roller shade is a high-end shade made with aluminum and high-quality finishes for indoor installation.

Artline is part of Bandalux collection of roller shades with front covers, highly decorative systems with high-end finishes for indoor installation. Bandalux systems ensure excellent sun protection, user privacy and a perfect roll of the fabric, with a straight and firm drop. They also personalize the interior decoration of the rooms where they are installed.

More information: https://contract.bandalux.com/en/roller-shades-decorative-covers/artline
